item.title: Chicago's children are getting caught in the chaos of immigration crackdowns
item.description: In Chicago, children and families have been traumatized by an immigration enforcement action involving tear gas

item.title: 'We have to be good or ICE will get us': Takeaways from Chicago children caught in immigration raids
item.description: Some Chicago parents and teachers say children were traumatized by a recent immigration enforcement action involving tear gas

item.title: Slow-moving storm dumps as much rain as a hurricane in parts of Central Florida
item.description: Intense storms that stalled over Central Florida unleashed nearly 20 inches of rain in 24 hours
